site_name: Brent Cross Shopping CentrePrince Charles DriveLondon  NW4 3FP
description: 1 x Norway Maple (applicant's ref. T4) and 1 x Weeping Willow (applicant's ref. T7) - Crown reduce 25% as specified; 2 x Black Poplar (applicant's ref. T87 - Poplars A and B of photograph attached to e-mail dated 29th August 2015) - Crown reduce 30% as specified; 3 x Weeping Willow (applicant's ref. T128, T130, T131) - Reduce back to previous points; 1 x Black Poplar (applicant's ref T1), 3 x Hornbeam (applicant's ref T6, T14 and T15), 2 x Maple (applicant's ref T8 and T10), 2 x Plane (applicant's ref T9 and T21), 1 x Red Oak (applicant's ref T11), 1 x Silver Maple (applicant's ref T12), 1 x Cherry (applicant's ref T13) and 3 x Willow (applicant's ref T43 - Willows A B and C of photograph attached to e-mail dated 29th August 2015) - Crown clean by removing dead, dying and diseased wood, stumps of any broken branches, unwanted epicormic shoots and any climbing plants (e.g. Ivy), Crown lift any branches overhanging the car park to 3M from ground level and any branches overhanging the roadway to 5M from ground level.  All standing in area A1 of Tree Preservation Order
